item.description:
Hey Incubators!

Your are all in for a treat this Saturday! Not only is it suppose to be amazing weather, but we are going to have an incubator, and it's going to be in my backyard!! And we are going to have a special host along for the ride. Rick Horner is the leader for the original incubator down in Philadelphia! He'll be here just for the evening. So get over to my place this Saturday for some awesome excitement!! I can promise some light snacks and lots of laughter.

As usual, no improv experience required! So come one, come all, and bring a friend.

To top it off, we'll be hitting up Pizzeria Uno's downtown on Huntington Ave. afterward as 15-20% of everyone's check will proceed Youth Enrichment Services, the non-profit who I just ran the marathon for last month!

Any questions or concerns, drop me an email!

Cheers!

Jason J.
item.how_to_find_us: Come around back, chairs will be set up!
item.name: What??!! Yes and...It's a Saturday Incubator, different place/time, same fun!!!
